Reviews.Title: LG Optimus Elite
Reviews.Author: Yette
Reviews.Content: This is my first Smart phone.  Bought it without a contract and I am very satisfied with its capability.Everyone lese in my family has Ipnoes, this seems to have the same funcitonality, there are a tremendous amount of apps, etc.  If I had any complaint, it would be typing on the qwerty keypad is somewhat frustrating since the software inserts its interpretation of what I'm typing into texts and searches instead of what I am typing correctly.  Smart software = dumb output. Aside from that, good phone with impressive capability.  Smaller screen makes int very handy.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Tamika Mills
Reviews.Content: I never had a lg phone before I am a Samsung lady but so far I love the phone and cant complain it was worth how much I did pay for it a good bang for the buck

Reviews.Title: March 2013 and still a good phone!
Reviews.Author: Lucky777
Reviews.Content: If you don't need the biggest, latest, greatest smartphone, users will be happy with this one.  It is fairly quick and takes good pics too.  I easily do bar code scans and more.
